Hi all,

The last days I have created three screencasts on REST Describe &
=
Compile, my WADL editor and compiler application written with the
Google We=
b Toolkit
(http://tomayac.de/rest-describe/latest/RestDescribe.html). You c=
an
check out the screencasts on my blog:
http://blog.tomayac.de/index.php?d=
ate=3D2007-07-13&time=3D13:15:44&perma=3DREST+Describe+%26+Comp.html

=3D=
=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D
The new v0.4.1 supports "Ajaxy" automatic namespace and =
XML schema
discovery. This makes the generated WADL files even better. It c=
an be
seen in the BBC API Walkthru screencast.
